attributes.action: SCAN ALL CANCER PATIENTS, LINDSEY'S LEGACY
attributes.additional_details:
We want the NHS to change their procedure in the aftercare of cancer patients and give all patientsd a full body scan at ther end of treatment.
This is following the lack of aftercare received by Lindsey Scrimshire following her battle with breast cancer.
Lindsey has now been diagnosed with terminal cancer, please sign today and help others to avoid the same heartbreak as Lindsey and her family
